name: Demand Curve
headline: We break down the strategies fast-growing startups use to grow.
description:
Demand Curve gives founders and marketers what they need to help grow their companies. Through courses, playbooks, conferences, masterclasses, and much more. 

It also has one of the largest communities and newsletters for founders and growth marketers.

Bell Curve, our sister marketing agency, has helped some of the top companies including Pilot, Microsoft, Framer, Stacker, Techcrunch, Ancestry, Invoice2go, and Feedly.

We do everything we can to make your ads as profitable as possible.
##### AdsManagement
We've managed budgets big and small on every digital ad channel.
##### Creative Production
We create ads that make your ideal customer desire your product. 
##### CRO & Landing Pages
We help you create landing pages that convert desire to cash.
##### TransparentReporting
You'll always know how our ads are performing and what we're doing.

### Here’s what’s included:
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ca4efffd7cf6e732e4e4fb1/666b2162cb21010e32e70c90_fast.svg)
Fast, no B.S. execution
We work at the pace of startups.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ca4efffd7cf6e732e4e4fb1/668f4bb040d07c6e72062ba7_image%20\(1\).svg)
Creative production
We take care of creating the ad copy and creative—with your approval, of course.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ca4efffd7cf6e732e4e4fb1/666b21621c6fae1ab61083d5_stack.svg)
Full-stack, senior team
You get a senior strategist, media buyer, creative designer, and reporting specialist.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ca4efffd7cf6e732e4e4fb1/666b21626655aba4f815d79b_reporting.svg)
Analytics and reporting
We help you get tracking in place. And you'll always know how your ads are performing.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ca4efffd7cf6e732e4e4fb1/666b21624d67f58a636f3c8a_cal.svg)
Fixed monthly rate
Up to $50k in ad spend.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ca4efffd7cf6e732e4e4fb1/666b2163819dcb04118a8d58_slack.svg)
Direct access
Stay up to date with updates on Slack, and biweekly meetings on Zoom.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ca4efffd7cf6e732e4e4fb1/666b2162ff81d38245afbeee_call.svg)
Strategic thought partner
We're growth nerds. We love being a thought partner to fellow founders.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ca4efffd7cf6e732e4e4fb1/668f4a08f299b78f722d68cb_gear%20\(1\).svg)
CRO and landing pages

## Low risk
We'll never lock you into long-term contracts. Clients normally see success in 3 months or less.
## We're experts
Our growth strategists have on average 14 years experience—we know how to run ads.
## Top 1%
We set a high bar when hiring from our community of 100,000 marketers.
## FAQ
Everything you need to know.
Do you create the ads and creatives?
That depends on you and your team.
We create both the ad copy and creative for most of our clients. We'll get your input based on your branding, audience, value props, etc. Then, we'll create a variety of ad variations that we think will perform best based on our experience. You'll, of course, have final approval on all ads that we run. And you'll have full visibility into the ads that are running at all times.
And if you have in-house designers who would prefer to do the creatives themselves, we 100% understand . In that case, we can give your team a creative brief on what we'd like them to create.
Will you help me with my landing pages?
We can give detailed breakdowns of how to change your landing pages to make them convert better. 
If you do not have engineering resources in-house, we have external partners we can recommend to help create them.
Have you worked with my type of company before?
We've been running a startup growth agency for over 7 years. We've had 100+ clients.
We've worked with all kinds of internet-based businesses:
  * B2B SaaS tools like Teams, Sentry, Framer, Envoy, and Segment.
  * Consumer software like Feedly, Ancestry, and Cameo.
  * Ecomm brands like Tabs, Perfect Keto, and Superfat.


Although most clients are B2B software, we can run your ads as long as you sell a product or service online.
Do we need tracking set up or will you do that for us?
You should already have tracking set up when we start working with you. 
However, we know that many early-stage startups need support in that area. For teams with in-house engineers, we can provide strategic guidance and detailed, step-by-step guides that they can follow. 
Or, we can do it for you for a one-time additional fee of $3,000.
Will we need to integrate any new tools on our end?
Before we start running ads, you must set up analytics and conversion tracking, such as Google Analytics and ad channel pixels
We can help you do that if you need.
Beyond that, we'll keep it as simple as possible for you. We'll communicate via Slack, Notion, and Zoom—the startup trifecta.
Does the price include ad spend?
Our fees are separate from ad spend and includes ad management, creative production, analytics/reporting, CRO work on your landing pages/funnel, and general growth strategy.
We can help you decide on your budget for ad spend.

## FAQ
Everything you need to know.
Do you create the ads and creatives?
That depends on you and your team.
We create both the ad copy and creative for most of our clients. We'll get your input based on your branding, audience, value props, etc. Then, we'll create a variety of ad variations that we think will perform best based on our experience. You'll, of course, have final approval on all ads that we run. And you'll have full visibility into the ads that are running at all times.
And if you have in-house designers who would prefer to do the creatives themselves, we 100% understand . In that case, we can give your team a creative brief on what we'd like them to create.
Will you help me with my landing pages?
We can give detailed breakdowns of how to change your landing pages to make them convert better. 
If you do not have engineering resources in-house, we have external partners we can recommend to help create them.
Have you worked with my type of company before?
We've been running a startup growth agency for over 7 years. We've had 100+ clients.
We've worked with all kinds of internet-based businesses:
  * B2B SaaS tools like Teams, Sentry, Framer, Envoy, and Segment.
  * Consumer software like Feedly, Ancestry, and Cameo.
  * Ecomm brands like Tabs, Perfect Keto, and Superfat.


Although most clients are B2B software, we can run your ads as long as you sell a product or service online.
Do we need tracking set up or will you do that for us?
You should already have tracking set up when we start working with you. 
However, we know that many early-stage startups need support in that area. For teams with in-house engineers, we can provide strategic guidance and detailed, step-by-step guides that they can follow. 
Or, we can do it for you for a one-time additional fee of $3,000.
Will we need to integrate any new tools on our end?
Before we start running ads, you must set up analytics and conversion tracking, such as Google Analytics and ad channel pixels
We can help you do that if you need.
Beyond that, we'll keep it as simple as possible for you. We'll communicate via Slack, Notion, and Zoom—the startup trifecta.
Does the price include ad spend?
Our fees are separate from ad spend and includes ad management, creative production, analytics/reporting, CRO work on your landing pages/funnel, and general growth strategy.
We can help you decide on your budget for ad spend.

generated_description:
Demand Curve is a dynamic marketing agency founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S19. Their mission is to distill and share the growth strategies employed by fast-growing startups, equipping founders and marketers with essential tactics to scale their businesses. 

Located in San Francisco, Demand Curve started as a resource hub offering courses, playbooks, masterclasses, and conferences tailored for startup founders and growth marketers. Now, it boasts one of the largest communities and newsletters in this space, with over 100,000 subscribers eager for actionable insights.

Their sister company, Bell Curve, has partnered with notable clients, including Pilot, Microsoft, and TechCrunch, showcasing the effectiveness of their strategies in real-world applications.

### Key Services Offered:
1. **Educational Programs**: Courses like the flagship Growth Program, which has helped over 2,000 founders grasp growth principles and enhance their revenue.
2. **Community and Resources**: An extensive library of growth resources, newsletters delivering top tactics bi-weekly, and a resource hub that features hours of researched content.
3. **Ads Management**: They offer paid media management with full transparency on ad performance, ensuring startups spend wisely and effectively.
4. **Hiring Support**: Assistance in recruiting overseas growth talent through their partnership with GrowthPair.

### Highlights:
- **Team**: Comprising 10 skilled individuals who are passionate about startup growth.
- **Local Impact**: Based in San Francisco, known for its vibrant startup ecosystem.
- **Community**: Engages a wide network of founders and marketers through its newsletter and other community-building initiatives.

Whether you’re a budding startup seeking growth strategies or an experienced founder looking to refine your marketing approach, Demand Curve offers a wealth of resources and expertise. If you're interested, check out their offerings at [Demand Curve's website](https://www.demandcurve.com).
